Text: Seriously the whole Bluray disc ? No time to rip anymore ?

@jenchai
"No time to encode" you meant.
 You're right, I'm busy right now with encoding The Lord of the Rings trilogy 1080 multi and only in about a week I'll do this one as it was requested by patbb ( a fateful pirate fan of mine ;-)
@insinuendo
It is indeed, it's good someone gave me the tip.

similar BD-s;
Casino 1995 1080p BluRay CEE VC-1 DTS-HD-MA
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6455904/Casino_1995_1080p_BluRay_CEE_VC-1_DTS-HD-MA_-_EiMi_

Carlito's Way (1993) BD50 VC-1 DTS-HD Eng Hun Por Spa Thai Tur
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6282960/Carlito_s_Way_%281993%29_BD50_VC-1_DTS-HD_Eng_Hun_Por_Spa_Thai_Tur_

Some people prefer an untouched & un-shrinked Blu-ray. I've seen myself many BDRips encoded in a rush with low encoding settings. Very few (maybe only 10%) do a proper encoding resulting in lossless image quality. Especially in dark scenes one can detect the faults in the "cheap" encodings.

It's sad that such few full Blu-rays are uploaded over here (a tracker with millions of visitors) while small pvt sites with only apx 40.000 members have 5 times more BD-s (thx to the selfish vampires who hit and run).

@mkvonly: Ok, great to know a encoded version will be there soon. I hope its 1080p. Been waiting for it.

Thanks for all the hard work. Cheers !!!
